chunks.cleaned_english_translation: Introduction. Historical Praise of Saint Odon by the author Mabillon, as found in "Acts of the Saints of the Order of Saint Benedict," Century 5, page 124.
chunks.original_latin: PROLEGOMENA. S. ODONIS ELOGIUM HISTORICUM AUCTORE MABILLONIO. (Acta Sanctorum ordinis S Benedicti saec V pag 124)
